name: Daily Manna 2020
description: Daily Manna is an extraction of Gods Word designed to draw the sincere seeker closer to God on daily basis through an insightful exposition and analysis of Gods Word. A devotional material of choice for individual and family worship, it provides spiritual nourishment for those truly committed to knowing and walking closely with God.  APP FEATURES - Night mode - Font size/style selection - Share devotion with friends and loved ones - Add to starred (for quick access) - In-app bible text  DISCLAIMER: This app is unofficial
